items.sentence: She scrubbed the kitchen floor with a brush.
She spends all her time thinking about boys.
She thought that he was wasting electricity.
Tom is saving money for a trip to Australia.
Tom is still in the kitchen, washing dishes.
Tom is the only person who can do this work.
Tom is the tallest boy on our football team.
We decorated the Christmas tree with lights.
Which do you like better, apples or bananas?
I wonder whether or not this is really true.
I wonder why Tom suggested we do that today.
I don\'t think this armchair is comfortable.
I don\'t think we can guarantee your safety.
I don\'t understand this obsession of yours.
I don\'t want to deal with this problem now.
Tom is in a very good mood today, isn\'t he?
Tom is often irresponsible, but Mary isn\'t.
Why do Americans eat turkey on Thanksgiving?
Why do you close your eyes when you kiss me?
Why do you consider that incident important?
